channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Tegra
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Tegra

item.title: CVE-2017-6278|2024-09-17T00:10:50.586Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20tegra
item.description: NVIDIA Tegra kernel contains a vulnerability in the CORE DVFS Thermal driver where there is the potential to read or write a buffer using an index or pointer that references a memory location after the end of the buffer, which may lead to a denial of service or possible escalation of privileges.
